+========================
+Release 328 (6 Jan 2020)
+========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix correctness issue for certain correlated JOIN queries when the subquery on the
+  right produces no rows. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of multi-byte characters when pattern is empty. (:issue:`2313`)
+* Fix failure when join criteria contains columns of different types. (:issue:`2320`)

replies.bodyText: It's hard to describe concisely. It's also one of those fixes that "unblocks" a bunch of other optimizations that allow for the decorrelation rules to work.

timeline.bodyText: this apparently applies to Phoenix too
timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,60 @@
+========================
+Release 328 (6 Jan 2020)
+========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix correctness issue for certain correlated JOIN queries when the subquery on the
+  right produces no rows. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of multi-byte characters when pattern is empty. (:issue:`2313`)
+* Fix failure when join criteria contains columns of different types. (:issue:`2320`)
+* Fix failure for complex outer join queries when dynamic filtering is enabled. (:issue:`2363`)
+* Improve support for correlated queries. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Support narrowing type coercions for insert queries. (:issue:`2061`)
+* Add ``regexp_count`` and ``regexp_position`` SQL functions. (:issue:`2136`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Fix a security issue allowing users to contain unauthorized access to Presto cluster
+  when using password authenticator with LDAP. (:issue:`2356`)
+* Add support for LDAP referrals in LDAP password authenticator. (:issue:`2354`)
+
+JDBC Driver
+-----------
+
+* Fix behavior of ``java.sql.Connection#commit()`` and ``java.sql.Connection#rollback()``
+  methods when no statements performed in a transaction. Previously these methods
+  would fail. (:issue:`2339`)
+* Fix failure when restoring autocommit mode with
+  ``java.sql.Connection#setAutocommit()`` (:issue:`2338`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Reduce query latency and Hive metastore load when ``optimizer.join-reordering-strategy``
+  is set to ``AUTOMATIC``. (:issue:`2184`)
+* Allow configuring ``hive.max-outstanding-splits-size`` to values bigger than
+  2 GB (2,147,483,647 bytes). (:issue:`2395`)
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Remove internal columns: ``_segment_start``, ``_segment_end`` and
+  ``_segment_count``. (:issue:`2303`)
+* Add new configuration property ``kafka.messages-per-split`` to control how many Kafka
+  messages will be processed by single Presto ``split``. (:issue:`2303`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when object does not have any fields. (:issue:`2217`)
+* Add support for querying index aliases. (:issue:`2324`)
+
+Other Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+These changes apply to the MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server connectors.
+
+* Add support for creating schema. (:issue:`1874`)

replies.bodyText: But for Phoenix we already had support for creating schema.
replies.author: Praveen2112

timeline.bodyText:
Please release notes for: #2290
MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server connectors changes
---
 * Introduce metadata caching that can be controlled with ``metadata.cache-ttl`` and ``metadata.cache-missing``. Notice that ``metadata.cache-ttl=0ms`` disables caching, default behaviour.  (:issue:`2290`)
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText:
Two more minor ones:
* Avoid redundant file system stat call when writing Parquet files. (:issue:`1746`)
* Avoid retrying permanent errors for S3-related services such as STS. (:issue:`2331`)

timeline.bodyText:
* Add support for caching metadata. The configuration property ``metadata.cache-ttl``
  controls how long to cache data and defaults to ``0ms` which disables caching,
  and ``metadata.cache-missing`` controls whether or not missing tables are cached.

timeline.bodyText: Probably update to 8 Jan
timeline.author: electrum

timeline.bodyText:
Please also mention:
Mysql
----
 - Allow Presto to handle Mysql ``DECIMAL`` type with precision higher than maximum precision (38) 
 By setting ``decimal-mapping=allow_overflow`` they are mapped to ``decimal(38, x)`` where ``x`` is configured with ``decimal-default-scale``.  
Rounding mode determined by ``decimal-rounding-mode``, which is set to ``UNNECESSARY`` and may also  accept values like: ``UP``, ``DOWN``, ``CEILING``, ``FLOOR``, ``HALF_UP`` and ``HALF_DOWN``.
Mentioned configuration properties are also exposed with session properties: ``decimal_mapping`` , ``decimal_default_scale`` and ``decimal_rounding_mode``. (:issue:`2088`)

PostgreSql
----
 - Allow Presto to handle PostgreSql ``DECIMAL`` type with unspecified precision and scale or ``DECIMAL`` type with precision higher than maximum precision (38)
 By setting ``decimal-mapping=allow_overflow`` they are mapped to ``decimal(38, x)`` where ``x`` is configured with ``decimal-default-scale``.  
Rounding mode determined by ``decimal-rounding-mode``, which is set to ``UNNECESSARY`` and may also  accept values like: ``UP``, ``DOWN``, ``CEILING``, ``FLOOR``, ``HALF_UP`` and ``HALF_DOWN``.
Mentioned configuration properties are also exposed with session properties: ``decimal_mapping`` , ``decimal_default_scale`` and ``decimal_rounding_mode``. (:issue:`2088`)

#2088
#2088

+* Fix failure for complex outer join queries when dynamic filtering is enabled. (:issue:`2363`)
+* Improve support for correlated queries. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Support narrowing type coercions for insert queries. (:issue:`2061`)
+* Add ``regexp_count`` and ``regexp_position`` SQL functions. (:issue:`2136`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Fix a security issue allowing users to contain unauthorized access to Presto cluster
+  when using password authenticator with LDAP. (:issue:`2356`)
+* Add support for LDAP referrals in LDAP password authenticator. (:issue:`2354`)
+
+JDBC Driver
+-----------
+
+* Fix behavior of ``java.sql.Connection#commit()`` and ``java.sql.Connection#rollback()``
+  methods when no statements performed in a transaction. Previously these methods
+  would fail. (:issue:`2339`)
+* Fix failure when restoring autocommit mode with
+  ``java.sql.Connection#setAutocommit()`` (:issue:`2338`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Reduce query latency and Hive metastore load when ``optimizer.join-reordering-strategy``
+  is set to ``AUTOMATIC``. (:issue:`2184`)
+* Allow configuring ``hive.max-outstanding-splits-size`` to values bigger than
+  2 GB (2,147,483,647 bytes). (:issue:`2395`)
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Remove internal columns: ``_segment_start``, ``_segment_end`` and
+  ``_segment_count``. (:issue:`2303`)
+* Add new configuration property ``kafka.messages-per-split`` to control how many Kafka
+  messages will be processed by single Presto ``split``. (:issue:`2303`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when object does not have any fields. (:issue:`2217`)
+* Add support for querying index aliases. (:issue:`2324`)
+
+Other Connector Changes

Phoenix
---
 - Allow to convert an unsupported type to varchar with ``unsupported-type-handling= CONVERT_TO_VARCHAR`` configuration property or ``unsupported_type_handling= CONVERT_TO_VARCHAR `` session property. (:issue:`2427`)

#2427
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+========================
+Release 328 (8 Jan 2020)
+========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix correctness issue for certain correlated join queries when the correlated subquery on
+  the right produces no rows. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of multi-byte characters for :doc:`/functions/regexp` when
+  the pattern is empty. (:issue:`2313`)
+* Fix failure when join criteria contains columns of different types. (:issue:`2320`)
+* Fix failure for complex outer join queries when dynamic filtering is enabled. (:issue:`2363`)
+* Improve support for correlated queries. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Allow inserting values of a larger type into as smaller type when the values fit. For example,
+  ``BIGINT`` into ``SMALLINT``, or ``VARCHAR(10)`` into ``VARCHAR(3)``. Values that don't fit will
+  cause an error at runtime. (:issue:`2061`)
+* Add :func:``regexp_count`` and :func:``regexp_position`` functions. (:issue:`2136`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Fix a security issue allowing users to gain unauthorized access to Presto cluster
+  when using password authenticator with LDAP. (:issue:`2356`)
+* Add support for LDAP referrals in LDAP password authenticator. (:issue:`2354`)
+
+JDBC Driver
+-----------
+
+* Fix behavior of ``java.sql.Connection#commit()`` and ``java.sql.Connection#rollback()``
+  methods when no statements performed in a transaction. Previously, these methods
+  would fail. (:issue:`2339`)
+* Fix failure when restoring autocommit mode with
+  ``java.sql.Connection#setAutocommit()`` (:issue:`2338`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Reduce query latency and Hive metastore load when ``optimizer.join-reordering-strategy``
+  is set to ``AUTOMATIC``. (:issue:`2184`)
+* Allow configuring ``hive.max-outstanding-splits-size`` to values bigger than 2GB. (:issue:`2395`)
+* Avoid redundant file system stat call when writing Parquet files. (:issue:`1746`)
+* Avoid retrying permanent errors for S3-related services such as STS. (:issue:`2331`)
+
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Remove internal columns: ``_segment_start``, ``_segment_end`` and
+  ``_segment_count``. (:issue:`2303`)
+* Add new configuration property ``kafka.messages-per-split`` to control how many Kafka
+  messages will be processed by a single Presto split. (:issue:`2303`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when an object in an Elasticsearch document
+  does not have any fields. (:issue:`2217`)
+* Add support for querying index aliases. (:issue:`2324`)
+

@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+========================
+Release 328 (8 Jan 2020)
+========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix correctness issue for certain correlated join queries when the correlated subquery on
+  the right produces no rows. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of multi-byte characters for :doc:`/functions/regexp` when
+  the pattern is empty. (:issue:`2313`)
+* Fix failure when join criteria contains columns of different types. (:issue:`2320`)
+* Fix failure for complex outer join queries when dynamic filtering is enabled. (:issue:`2363`)
+* Improve support for correlated queries. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Allow inserting values of a larger type into as smaller type when the values fit. For example,
+  ``BIGINT`` into ``SMALLINT``, or ``VARCHAR(10)`` into ``VARCHAR(3)``. Values that don't fit will
+  cause an error at runtime. (:issue:`2061`)
+* Add :func:``regexp_count`` and :func:``regexp_position`` functions. (:issue:`2136`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Fix a security issue allowing users to gain unauthorized access to Presto cluster
+  when using password authenticator with LDAP. (:issue:`2356`)
+* Add support for LDAP referrals in LDAP password authenticator. (:issue:`2354`)
+
+JDBC Driver
+-----------
+
+* Fix behavior of ``java.sql.Connection#commit()`` and ``java.sql.Connection#rollback()``
+  methods when no statements performed in a transaction. Previously, these methods
+  would fail. (:issue:`2339`)
+* Fix failure when restoring autocommit mode with
+  ``java.sql.Connection#setAutocommit()`` (:issue:`2338`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Reduce query latency and Hive metastore load when ``optimizer.join-reordering-strategy``
+  is set to ``AUTOMATIC``. (:issue:`2184`)
+* Allow configuring ``hive.max-outstanding-splits-size`` to values bigger than 2GB. (:issue:`2395`)
+* Avoid redundant file system stat call when writing Parquet files. (:issue:`1746`)
+* Avoid retrying permanent errors for S3-related services such as STS. (:issue:`2331`)
+
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Remove internal columns: ``_segment_start``, ``_segment_end`` and
+  ``_segment_count``. (:issue:`2303`)
+* Add new configuration property ``kafka.messages-per-split`` to control how many Kafka
+  messages will be processed by a single Presto split. (:issue:`2303`)

+* Fix query failure when an object in an Elasticsearch document

+* Add support for querying index aliases. (:issue:`2324`)
+
+Other Connector Changes
+-----------------------

+These changes apply to the MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redshift and SQL Server connectors:
+
+* Add support for creating schemas. (:issue:`1874`)
+* Add support for caching metadata. The configuration property ``metadata.cache-ttl``
+  controls how long to cache data and defaults to ``0ms` which disables caching,

timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+========================
+Release 328 (8 Jan 2020)
+========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix correctness issue for certain correlated join queries when the correlated subquery on
+  the right produces no rows. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Fix incorrect handling of multi-byte characters for :doc:`/functions/regexp` when
+  the pattern is empty. (:issue:`2313`)
+* Fix failure when join criteria contains columns of different types. (:issue:`2320`)
+* Fix failure for complex outer join queries when dynamic filtering is enabled. (:issue:`2363`)
+* Improve support for correlated queries. (:issue:`1969`)
+* Allow inserting values of a larger type into as smaller type when the values fit. For example,
+  ``BIGINT`` into ``SMALLINT``, or ``VARCHAR(10)`` into ``VARCHAR(3)``. Values that don't fit will
+  cause an error at runtime. (:issue:`2061`)
+* Add :func:``regexp_count`` and :func:``regexp_position`` functions. (:issue:`2136`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Fix a security issue allowing users to gain unauthorized access to Presto cluster
+  when using password authenticator with LDAP. (:issue:`2356`)
+* Add support for LDAP referrals in LDAP password authenticator. (:issue:`2354`)
+
+JDBC Driver
+-----------
+
+* Fix behavior of ``java.sql.Connection#commit()`` and ``java.sql.Connection#rollback()``
+  methods when no statements performed in a transaction. Previously, these methods
+  would fail. (:issue:`2339`)
+* Fix failure when restoring autocommit mode with
+  ``java.sql.Connection#setAutocommit()`` (:issue:`2338`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Reduce query latency and Hive metastore load when ``optimizer.join-reordering-strategy``
+  is set to ``AUTOMATIC``. (:issue:`2184`)
+* Allow configuring ``hive.max-outstanding-splits-size`` to values bigger than 2GB. (:issue:`2395`)
+* Avoid redundant file system stat call when writing Parquet files. (:issue:`1746`)
+* Avoid retrying permanent errors for S3-related services such as STS. (:issue:`2331`)
+
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Remove internal columns: ``_segment_start``, ``_segment_end`` and
+  ``_segment_count``. (:issue:`2303`)
+* Add new configuration property ``kafka.messages-per-split`` to control how many Kafka
+  messages will be processed by a single Presto split. (:issue:`2303`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when an object in an Elasticsearch document
+  does not have any fields. (:issue:`2217`)
+* Add support for querying index aliases. (:issue:`2324`)
+
+Other Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+These changes apply to the MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redshift and SQL Server connectors:
+
+* Add support for creating schemas. (:issue:`1874`)
+* Add support for caching metadata. The configuration property ``metadata.cache-ttl``
+  controls how long to cache data and defaults to ``0ms` which disables caching,
+  and ``metadata.cache-missing`` controls whether or not missing tables are cached. (:issue:`2290`)
+
+This change applies to the MySQL and PostgreSQL connectors:
+
+* Add support for mapping ``DECIMAL`` types with precision larger than 38 to a

Add docs for decimal handling in mysql and postgresql connectors
